sentences.english: Indra worried that this powerful sage would one day want to usurp the position of king of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心這位強有力的聖哲有一天會篡奪天帝的位置。

sentences.english: Yoga Poses such as the Half Spinal Twist and the Sage Twist primarily benefit the spine and back.
sentences.chinese: 半脊柱扭轉和聖哲馬裏騎式主要使背部和後部受益。

sentences.english: Also called Marichi's Yoga Pose, the Sage Twist Pose benefits the abdominal organs and spine.
sentences.chinese: 聖哲馬裏琪式，使腹內器官和脊柱受益。

definition: in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers/fig. mutual sensitivity/tacit exchange of romantic feelings/a meeting of minds
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: to treat one another with absolute sincerity (idiom); to show total devotion
lit. persons who walk different paths cannot make plans together/to go separate ways (idiom)
pinyin: dao4 bu4 tong2 bu4 xiang1 wei2 mou2

definition: string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination/perfect pair
